import { AccountCircle, ArrowDropDown, Notifications, Search } from '@material-ui/icons' import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import './navbar.scss' const Navbar = () => { const [ isScrolled, setIsScrolled ] = useState(false) window.onscroll = () =>{ setIsScrolled(window.pageYOffset === 0 ? true : false) // return () => window.onscroll = null; } return (
Homepage Series Movies New and Popular My List
Settings Logout
) } export default Navbar
